name: 6. G overall bonus
description: It is recommended to play the G map at this difficulty level. It takes effect at 200% difficulty. The computer hero has 10 times the experience and the town creatures have 5 times the weekly production.

chinese.name: 6. G overall bonus
chinese.description: 此难度推荐玩G图，200%难度下生效，电脑英雄10倍经验，城镇生物5倍周产。

author: Nordsoft
